segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five emotional shackles.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
segments.en: Firstly, a mendicant isn’t free of greed, desire, fondness, thirst, passion, and craving for sensual pleasures.

segments.pli: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
segments.en: This being so, their mind doesn’t incline toward keenness, commitment, persistence, and striving.

segments.pli: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ paṭhamo cetasovinibandho.
segments.en: This is the first emotional shackle.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye avītarāgo hoti … pe …
segments.en: Furthermore, a mendicant isn’t free of greed for the body …
They’re not free of greed for form …

segments.pli: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati … pe …
segments.en: They eat as much as they like until their belly is full, then indulge in the pleasures of sleeping, lying, and drowsing …

segments.pli: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati: ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
segments.en: They live the spiritual life hoping to be reborn in one of the orders of gods, thinking: ‘By this precept or observance or mortification or spiritual life, may I become one of the gods!’

segments.pli: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati: ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
segments.en: This being so, their mind doesn’t incline toward keenness, commitment, persistence, and striving.

segments.pli: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ pañcamo cetasovinibandho.
segments.en: This is the fifth emotional shackle.
These are the five emotional shackles.”
